content:
ServiceRemotingProviderAttribute.CreateServiceRemotingClientFactory Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.dll

In this Article

Creates a service remoting client factory that can be used by the ServiceProxyFactory to create a proxy for the remoted interface of the service.

public abstract Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Client.IServiceRemotingClientFactory CreateServiceRemotingClientFactory (Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.IServiceRemotingCallbackClient callbackClient);
Parameters
callbackClient
IServiceRemotingCallbackClient

Client implementation where the callbacks should be dispatched.

Returns
IServiceRemotingClientFactory

An IServiceRemotingClientFactory.
